description: Exalted One, daughter of the Dagda, the triple goddess of the sacred flame. Brigid embodies the three fires of Celtic civilization: the fire of the hearth (home and hospitality), the fire of the forge (craft and transformation), and the fire of inspiration (poetry and prophecy). She is the divine spark that illuminates, transforms, and heals.
